author: Og Mandino
message: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
title: Thought of the day

author: Forrest Gump
message: My mama always said: life's like a box of chocolate you never know what you gonna get.
title: Thought of the day

author: Jean Lacordaire
message: We are the leaves of one branch, the drops of one sea, the flowers of one garden.
title: Thought of the day

message: If you come to a fork in the road, take it.
title: Thought of the day
